lyric:
[00:12.440]Not sure if you know this
[00:16.790]But when we first met
[00:19.460]I got so nervous I couldn't speak
[00:25.030]In that very moment
[00:28.870]I found the one and
[00:31.810]my life had found this missing piece
[00:37.750]So as long as I live I love you
[00:42.690]Will have and hold you
[00:45.780]You look so beautiful in white
[00:50.820]And from now to my very last breath
[00:55.760]This day I'll cherish
[00:58.910]You look so beautiful in white Tonight
[01:11.120]What we have is timeless
[01:14.770]My love is endless
[01:17.660]And with this dream I Say to the world
[01:23.000]You're my every reason you're all
[01:27.090]that I believe in
[01:29.770]With all my heart I mean every word
[01:35.710]So as long as I live I love you
[01:40.590]Will have and hold you
[01:43.790]You look so beautiful in white
[01:48.680]And from now to my very last breath
[01:53.010]This day I'll cherish
[01:56.150]You look so beautiful in white Tonight
[02:08.970]You look so beautiful in white
[02:21.280]so beautiful in white, Tonight
[02:28.950]And if our daughter is what our future holds
[02:33.430]I hope she has your eyes
[02:36.670]Finds love like you and I did
[02:40.860]Yeah, if she falls in love and we will let her go
[02:45.640]I'll walk her down the aisle
[02:48.780]She looks so beautiful in white
[02:57.850]You look so beautiful in white
[03:03.100]So as long as I live I love you
[03:07.430]Will have and hold you
[03:10.620]You look so beautiful in white
[03:15.710]And from now to my very last breath
[03:19.940]This day I'll cherish
[03:23.530]You look so beautiful in white Tonight
[03:35.390]You look so beautiful in white Tonight
tlyric:
[00:12.440]不确定你是否清楚
[00:16.790]当我第一次见到你
[00:19.460]我紧张到话都说不清楚
[00:25.030]在那一刻
[00:28.870]我找到了我的唯一
[00:31.810]终于填补了我生命中的缺失
[00:37.750]所以我会永远爱你
[00:42.690]会一直拥抱守护你
[00:45.780]穿着白色婚纱的你如此美丽动人
[00:50.820]直到我生命结束
[00:55.760]我都会铭记这一天
[00:58.910]今晚白色婚纱的你是如此美丽动人
[01:11.120]我们拥有的是天长地久
[01:14.770]我对你的爱是无穷无尽
[01:17.660]我要把这个梦想告诉全世界
[01:23.000]你是我全部的动力
[01:27.090]你是我全部的信仰
[01:29.770]每个字都由心而发
[01:35.710]所以我会永远爱你
[01:40.590]会一直拥抱守护你
[01:43.790]穿着白色婚纱的你如此美丽动人
[01:48.680]直到我生命结束
[01:53.010]我都会铭记这一天
[01:56.150]今晚白色婚纱的你是如此美丽动人
[02:08.970]今晚的你，真的好美
[02:21.280]真的好美
[02:28.950]如果我们以后生了一个女儿
[02:33.430]我希望她也有你一般的眼睛
[02:36.670]像你我一样遇到爱
[02:40.860]当她坠入爱河我们就会放手
[02:45.640]我会牵着她走过婚礼殿堂
[02:48.780]她穿着白色婚纱的样子一定也会很美
[02:57.850]正如你一样
[03:03.100]所以我会永远爱你
[03:07.430]会一直拥抱守护你
[03:10.620]穿着白色婚纱的你如此美丽动人
[03:15.710]直到我生命结束
